Maze

Class DoorTile

  • java.lang.Object
    • Maze.Tile
      • Maze.DoorTile

  • public class DoorTile
extends Tile
    Represents a door in the game. Doors can be unlocked using a key with the same color as the door. By unlocking the door the player can access other parts of the map.
     

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class Maze.Tile

        PATH

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DoorTile(int row, int col, java.lang.String color)
      Creates a door tile with a pre-defined color.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getColor()
      Gets the colour of the door
      java.awt.Image getImage()
      Paints the item in the tile on top of each tile.
      void interact()
      Method used to interact with the door: this is when the player moves onto a tile with the door on it In order to interact with a door the player has to have collected the correct key
      boolean isWalkable()
      Returns whether a door is unlocked and therefore it can be walked through
      void setWalkable()
      Checks if the player has the correct key and if so unlock the door
      void setWalkable(boolean isWalkable)
      Locks/unlocks the door.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DoorTile

        public DoorTile(int row,
                int col,
                java.lang.String color)
        Creates a door tile with a pre-defined color.
        Parameters:
        row - The row (in regards to the board) of the door
        col - The column (in regards to the board) of the door
        color - The pre-defined color of the board
